sponsorship.platform_handle_label: Username or phone of the user you want to sponsor
sponsorship.unlink_message: You can now become an autonomous user. This breaks the link between you and {sponsorName} and AI will stop working until you configure your Profile.

tools.title: Advanced options
tools.no_tools_available: No tools available for this type

chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Used for basic chat functionality and integration with various external tools. This is the model you talk to.

reasoning.title: Reasoning
reasoning.description: This is a model that usually runs in the background and notifies you when it's done, only used for reasoning and complex, problem-solving tasks.

copywriting.title: Copywriting
copywriting.description: This is a model that is used for copywriting, content creation, spelling and grammar corrections, as well as various other tasks that require style and tone adjustments.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: This is a model that is used for vision tasks, such as image classification, image understanding, and chatting with images. This is what is used when you upload an image to the chat.

hearing.title: Hearing
hearing.description: This is a model that is used for hearing tasks, such as speech recognition, speech-to-text, natural language understanding, and chatting with audio. This is what is used when you upload an audio file to the chat.

images_gen.title: Images Generation
images_gen.description: This is a model that is used for image generation, such as generating images from text or images from images.

images_edit.title: Images Edit
images_edit.description: This is a model that is used for image editing, such as photo replacements, object removal, adding special effects, and changing the style of images.

images_restoration.title: Images Restoration
images_restoration.description: This is a model that is used for image restoration, such as removing noise, fixing blur, and reducing photographic damage.

images_inpainting.title: Images Inpainting
images_inpainting.description: This is a model that is used for image inpainting, such as removing misplaced objects, fixing generative imaging holes, fixing anatomical deformities, and restoring images.

images_background_removal.title: Images Background Removal
images_background_removal.description: This is a model that is used for image background removal, such as removing the background of an image, fixing the background of an image, and changing the background of an image.

search.title: Search
search.description: This is a model that is used for web search, such as searching the web for information, news, products, services, or background research on a topic not known to your chat companion.

embedding.title: Embedding
embedding.description: This is a model that is used for embedding, such as embedding text, images, or audio into a vector space. It's used for similarity search across internal databases, documents, and other semantic search tasks. This is used when you upload a PDF file to the chat.

api_fiat_exchange.title: API Fiat Exchange
api_fiat_exchange.description: This is an API that is used for checking the exchange rate of a fiat currency.

api_crypto_exchange.title: API Crypto Exchange
api_crypto_exchange.description: This is an API that is used for checking the exchange rate of a crypto currency.

api_twitter.title: API Twitter
api_twitter.description: This is an API that is used for reading Twitter content.

errors.check_link: Check your access link and try again.
errors.sponsored_user: Your usage is sponsored by {sponsorName}. To become an autonomous user, go to {sponsorshipsLink}.

language_intelligence.title: Language Intelligence
language_intelligence.description: The assistant understands and responds in your preferred language with 50+ languages supported, making conversations natural and accessible for users worldwide. Ask anything and get smart answers, fast.

independent.title: Independent
independent.description: Switch between chat apps and AI platforms without losing your chat history or settings. The assistant keeps your experience consistent and seamless, wherever you interact.

privacy.title: Open, yet private
privacy.description: The code is fully open-source for transparency, but your data and conversations remain private and accessible only to you. Self-host for even greater control over your information.

web_search.title: Web Search
web_search.description: Get up-to-date information from the web, including news, analysis, currency prices, crypto prices, assets, and more, directly within your chat.

media.title: Attachments & Media
media.description: Send images, voice messages, and documents to the assistant – it can process and use them to create helpful responses or perform tasks. Chat with your photos or documents, not just text.

imaging.title: AI Imaging
imaging.description: Create new images, edit existing images using text instructions, or restore old and broken images using advanced AI models. The assistant brings your ideas to life with powerful and easy-to-use tools.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Stay informed with real-time monitoring of news, markets, and topics you care about. The assistant proactively keeps you in the loop, so you never miss a beat.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.description: A unified user profile lets you manage your identity, billing, credits, tool preferences, and AI provider settings across all chat platforms. Adjust anything – just ask the assistant to open your settings, or type `/settings` in chat.

chat_settings.title: Chat Settings
chat_settings.description: Customize how the assistant behaves in each chat, including language, reply style, and notification preferences. Access these options anytime by asking the assistant to open settings, or by typing `/settings` in chat.

sponsorships.title: Sponsorships
sponsorships.description: Share your access to the assistant with others, while keeping your and their usage private. Sponsorships let you extend your assistant's benefits to friends or family, and you can always manage them via the assistant or by typing `/settings` in chat.
